category.name: Classification.Administration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWS_cls_attribute_interchangeability_definition
preference.preference_description: Defines the interchangeability between classification attributes. For example consider attributes with attribute IDs 1000 and 1001 are to be defined as interchangeable. The values should be specified as below - 1000:1001 1001:1000 Multiple attributes to be defined as interchangeable need to provided in comma-separated format - 1010:1005,2005
